name: REGULAR NYC
address: 19 Rector St, New York, NY 10006, USA

reviews.text: Stumbled upon this spot after going to the DMV. What a gem of a spot. Found a healthy breakfast that was keto friendly with a salad! So yummy! Go you won't be disappointed.

We had a great experience at The Regular while in town for the marathon. The food was amazing and I can‚Äôt say enough about the friendly staff, they were all attentive and a big shout out to the barista in the front‚Ä¶she greeted everyone with a smile and was so pleasant going above and beyond to make everyone that walked in the door feel like so welcomed.

Such a hidden gem!! Loved the food, atmosphere, ceremonial grade matcha, the service, and vibe!! The special today was sooo good and all the ingredients tasted very fresh. Coffee was super great too.

Would come back in a heartbeat and hope the road leads me back downtown to visit again soon ü´∂
We loved the food and coffee here! The staff were super friendly. We had an amazing time.
One of the best breakfasts I had in Manhattan
Excellent!
Thank you for the very nice regular breakfast. We enjoyed the food, the service and the cosy staff on our sunday morning in NY cityüôèüèªüí´üíú
Bardzo smaczne jedzenie, dobra kawa, mi≈Ça obs≈Çuga. Trochƒô czekali≈õmy w kolejce ale my≈õlƒô, ≈ºe by≈Ço warto.
French toast was so good! What made it even better was the super friendly staff, would definitely come back.

The staff is friendly, and I‚Äôm sure they do what they can,but the kitchen is extremely slow, which is especially disappointing for a breakfast spot. We visited New York over the weekend, and even though it was just the two of us, we waited nearly 50 minutes for a bagel. When it finally arrived, both bagels were burnt, and our French toast order never came. It‚Äôs frustrating because everything looks delicious, but the kitchen‚Äôs pace really takes away from the experience. If you‚Äôre not in a rush, maybe you won‚Äôt mind... but it wasn‚Äôt for us.
I had the bagel and the French toast and both were amazing! It‚Äôs small and cozy and just a nice spot to stop for brunch!
I really enjoyed starting my day at this restaurant. Food was delicious. Service was excellent. 10/10

We walked to Regular NYC from our hotel and really enjoyed it! It‚Äôs a small, cozy spot with great coffee and food. I had the maple oat milk latte, which was delicious, and we shared a Reuben sandwich on toasted sourdough and a chicken salad sandwich ‚Äî both were excellent. The server was friendly, the atmosphere was relaxed, and the pricing wasn‚Äôt bad for New York City. A great find for breakfast or lunch in the city!
Previously my all time favorite but coffee quality has been dropping.
Oh man I loved this place, it's small, great coffee, simple menu, super friendly staff. One of my favorites of our NYC touring.
Great food, great music, great people!!  Congrats!!
What a lovely start in the day. Lots of gluten free options. The service was excellent as the quality of the food. Definitely will be back.
Unglaublich gut Kaffee und Avotoast 10/10...und nette Leute
The coffee is incredibly good and the staff very friendly.

So‚Ä¶ We took the 1 South from the Flower district and I must say that this Spot was an AMAZING find!ü§©

The BENNY and the Ranchero breakfasts were absolutely STELLAR!

The cappuccinos were hands down
‚Äútop 5‚Äù for tastiest EVER!
We had to have seconds you know.
‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏èü§©‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

We will definitely come back on our next trip to the city! üòã
Delicious food, super friendly and attentive staff. We shared one bowl between two - the portion was very generous !
Perfect for a date night.
They deliver delicious dishes with competent service. How could any place offer more than this? This place excels in food preparation. They provide extra effort here. This place is a gem!

El servicio Regular, como su nombre. Nos dijeron que deb√≠amos esperar 20 min por una mesa, entonces dijimos para llevar. Finalmente se desocuparon mesas muy r√°pido, y pedimos si nos pod√≠amos sentar, y dijeron que no ‚Äúpara ser justos con la gente‚Äù, sin embargo, no hab√≠a nadie esperando. Tuvimos que comer en la barra, habiendo mesas vac√≠as. Nuestro AVO toast ven√≠a sin queso feta, tuvimos que mostrarle una foto para decirle lleva feta y nos trajeran el queso aparte. Hablar amable y tener una sonrisa en la cara no significa buen servicio.
Awesome food and best coffee we‚Äôd had in the big apple.
Great cappuccinos and breakfast options.
Best French toast I ever had!

Absolutely unforgettable breakfast! The dishes were delicious, the ambiance was warm and inviting, and the coffee had a deep, robust flavor. The staff were incredibly welcoming, and they went out of their way to make our visit with a young child comfortable and enjoyable.
I ordered an over medium egg and it was actually over medium
Great coffee. Among the best I‚Äôve had in NY. Nice staff also.
Bestes Fr√ºhst√ºck von New York! Top Qualit√§t und jede Speise sehr raffiniert zusammengestellt. Kaffee schmeckt ebenso sehr sehr gut. Waren in zehn Tagen vier mal hier! üòÖ

Seriously good food! Will come back again soon for that, good recommendation from the guy that worked there on what to eat. However the lady that showed up later kind of bullied us away because she probably wanted to free up the table, so much for paying full service.
Food is so good I got ‚ÄúThe bagel‚Äù with GF bagel. Service was nice too.

Husband and I walked past 5 other coffee shops to get here based on reviews. Boy, am I glad we stuck it out! Devine maple latte, best avocado toast I‚Äôve ever had, and the French toast was absolutely decadent. Do not miss this one when you‚Äôre in NYC in the financial district. 100% worth the walk.
I love the coffee here and the avocado toast is my fav!

Regular NYC is such a gem of a breakfast spot right by my apartment. It might be on the smaller side, but  it's cozy and welcoming. The staff is so friendly, and Francesca, my server, was absolutely lovely‚Äîwarm, attentive, and made me feel right at home.

I tried the avocado toast, and it was perfect‚Äîjust the right hint of spice, the flavors were exquisite, and the toast itself was done perfectly. The coffee is also fantastic, rich and smooth, making it the perfect pairing for breakfast.

The place is clean, the atmosphere is relaxed, and the convenience of having it right in my neighborhood makes it even better. Definitely a go-to spot for great breakfast and coffee!
Awesome place for breakfast/brunch. It is cozy, food and coffee are amazing. Staff is friendly and caring. Definitely recommend!
Delicious dishes, friendly staff - atmosphere as you‚Äôd expect from a typical breakfast place (hip)

Best coffee in the city and great brunch food that is well worth the wait. Not to mention, they have excellent service. Thank you Alex for the latte on the house this morning! (He gave it for free because he felt bad that I was waiting so long in line)

Will be back soon!
Great service and amazing food!
Amazing place, probably the best coffee that I had in my life and food is delicious, definitely coming back again when I'll be in NY!
Hands down best breakfast in NYC! Fresh, tasty and incredibly reasonable prices. The team there is awesome and so is the coffee. Highly recommend!!
Fantastic breakfast which we visited several times during our stay.

This is my second time dining in and I enjoyed more! The Bowl that I had was wonderful. Rice was lightly seasoned, which was perfect, and all toppings like mushrooms, seaweed, kimchi, and avocado were just right. Matcha latte was also great!

S√º√ües Caf√© mit nettem Personal, auch wenn ordentlich Druck gemacht wird, schnell zu bezahlen und den Tisch wieder frei zu machen.
Essen war qualitativ gut, ich h√§tte mir ein wenig mehr Garnitur auf dem Teller gew√ºnscht.

nice and flavourful latte
nice latte art art :)

We went in for a quick breakfast before leaving for the airport. We regret that we didn‚Äôt find this place earlier.
Everything was 10/10. Our waitress Francesca was very polite and helpful when we needed to pick gluten free options.
Coffee was great. The place is clean and neat. The food was way better than other places around the area.
Recommend, specially if you need a place with gluten free options in the menu.
It was delicious!
This was an excellent first meal after a red eye. The cappuccinos were perfect. I got the Reuben breakfast sandwich, which was great.

This place leaves me speechless. The kitchen excels at flavor harmony, making each bite special. It's snug but comfortable, with staff who are nice to deal with. The employees give outstanding support! I'm entirely devoted to REGULAR NYC.

Amazing food and service. It‚Äôs walk in and they do not take any reservation. You have to wait during peak hours. Seating space is limited. However food is absolutely delicious. Loved the food. The matcha latte and espresso was great. We ordered the French toast with pistachio cream and croissant sandwich. Both were delicious!

Me and my friend came here after an early morning run in Brooklyn and Wall Street, we were hungry and this was one of the first bars opening that morning. We decided to make a sweet European breakfast with coffee and croissants but after that we saw other people ordering delicious toasts. We then decided to make another round ordering a salty toast as well and it was awesome. I truly recommend coming here for the toasts: big size, high quality ingredients and easy to share!
Feels like a reward after an early morning run!

The staff were super friendly and attentive. The food was good overall, though the avocado on my toast was overripe and had an off smell. On the bright side, the ginger lemon loose tea and coffee was delicious and really stood out.
We waited about 20 minutes for a table around 10 AM

The best breakfast experience on a Sunday morning. The food was amazing, the atmosphere was cozy, the coffee was rich and the staff is super friendly. We went in with a toddler and they were very accommodating.

This is probably one of the places you would just walk by without noticing it. Yet this would be a mistake.

It‚Äôs a great place for a very nice breakfast. The food is excellent, prepared with attention to detail and love, the staff is friendly and attentive.

Definitely one of the best paces for breakfast on the Manhattan financial district!

Food was delicious & generous portions. Good coffee.
Friendly attentive prompt service, one of the very few places I tipped happily!
Clean & comfortable seats.
This will be my go to eats from now on!

This cute new brunch spot opened near my apartment, and I‚Äôd always noticed a line out the door on weekends. We decided to try it on my birthday ‚Äî and it did not disappoint. The menu was authentic and refreshingly different from typical brunch spots, with unique twists on each dish. Everything we tried tasted amazing.

The manager personally checked in on every table, and when he found out it was my birthday, he surprised us with complimentary desserts ‚Äî such a thoughtful touch. Overall, it was a fantastic experience, and I highly recommend it!

The food was fantastic! The service was fast and everything came out great. The food was delicious. My friend was visiting from TX and loved the place so much we both got two cups of coffee (one to stay and one to go). She also appreciated the vegetarian options since she does not eat meat. The baristas at this place make a GREAT cup of coffee. The food was also fantastic (esp with the crazy portion and the insanely reasonable price).

Check this place out if you are in the area and make sure you dine in and tip the fabulous staff!

Great breakfast cafe next to my hotel. I tried this place before heading to the airport and it was the perfect spot to conclude my trip with. The staff here are very welcoming and energetic. I got the French toast and cafe olla. They were both excellent. The French toast is even too decadent for me to finish. Little place, big energy.

It is a small place that has a charming atmosphere, the waitresses and waiters are very friendly and make you feel very welcome. They also have an amazing avocado tostada that is the best I've ever eaten üòã

The food are amazing! Not just insta worthy but delicious. (Not to mention the big portion)
The staff are very friendly and helpful. When we arrived, the tables were full but how the staff handled the situation and interacted with customers were superb!
I would definitely recommend this place if you stay nearby.

Love the food, the coffee and the people there! I ate there almost everyday when I stayed a hotel nearby. Next time I will definitely come again! By the way, the place is always full of people. But they can always help you find a table if you want to sit down or just order food/drink to-go

Stumbling upon this hidden gem near our hotel we were met with a little bit of a queue on our first time going there. But let me tell you, it was worth the wait!

The food is absolutely delicious, the workers actually seem like they enjoy their work and are super nice.

We‚Äôve been in New York for 2 full days and on each of those days we came to this shop and we look forward to coming back more often. You could almost say we‚Äôre starting to become REGULAR customers - pun intended!

I can absolutely recommend this place, especially for breakfast!

Edit: It‚Äôs our last day in NYC and we‚Äôve been here everyday! Just because it‚Äôs super delicious and the staff is so extremely nice. As part of our last day the drinks are on them, so being a reoccurring customer pays off üòâ

Thank you for making our stay in New York delicious! <3

What a lovely spot! Top coffee and wonderful food offerings.
This little gem has great atmosphere and I would highly recommend.

Thank you for the hospitality :)!

A Hidden Gem in NYC!

I had an incredible experience at Regular‚Äîa restaurant that‚Äôs anything but ordinary. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere struck the perfect balance between cozy and contemporary. The staff was warm, attentive, and genuinely passionate about the food they serve. The owner went above and beyond and Shirley has a passion for what he does / his restaurant

Every dish we ordered was thoughtfully prepared and bursting with flavor. The ingredients were fresh, the plating was beautiful, and the portions were just right. Regular delivers on every level.

It‚Äôs rare to find a place that feels so familiar yet stands out so much. I‚Äôll absolutely be back. Highly recommend!

Such good food!! I ordered the ranchero with a side of gluten free tortillas and a matcha. There was quite a wait for a table so we opted to do takeout instead and they gave us a free pastry for the trouble. 10/10 service and the food was fantastic

Awesome brunch spot - we had the bagel and the shredded beef dish, both were very flavourful!
Very short wait to be seated too - only thing I‚Äôd suggest is better AC, otherwise was near perfect!

We visited New York as a group of 9 this week and hid in here from the rain. The food was delicious, staff were more than happy to accommodate the groups dietary requirements and preferences. The atmosphere is chilled and welcoming. The staff were friendly, the owner Alex spent a lot of time chatting to us and giving his NYC recommendations. Loved it here! If we are ever back in NYC we will be popping in here for sure!!!

üìç REGULAR NYC ‚Äì Kreatives Fr√ºhst√ºck im Herzen Manhattans

üçΩÔ∏è Bestellt:
‚Äì The Ranchero: Black Beans, langsam gegartes Beef Brisket, Avocado, Chili, Cotija-K√§se, Tortillas & Spiegelei
‚Äì The Avo: Avocado, Salsa Verde, Ziegenfeta, Pepitas & eingelegte Chilis
- Iced Macchiato & Orangensaft

‚≠ê Geschmack: The Ranchero war hervorragend ‚Äì zart, w√ºrzig und perfekt abgestimmt mit den restlichen Zutaten. Auch The Avo war kreativ belegt und sehr aromatisch. Der Iced Macchiato war f√ºr US-Verh√§ltnisse gut, der Orangensaft kam aus der Flasche, war aber dennoch lecker.

ü•£ Portionen & Preis: Ausreichend und s√§ttigend ‚Äì keine Schn√§ppchen, aber f√ºr Manhattan absolut im Rahmen.

üï∞Ô∏è Service: Schnell und freundlich, allerdings f√ºhlten wir uns am Ende etwas zum Bezahlen gedr√§ngt ‚Äì schade, da noch ein Kaffee geplant war.

ü™ë Ambiente: Modern und gem√ºtlich ‚Äì mit Sitzpl√§tzen im Inneren, angenehm ruhig und stilvoll gestaltet.

üîÅ Fazit: Wer im Financial District ein kreatives, geschmacklich hochwertiges Fr√ºhst√ºck sucht, ist hier genau richtig. Empfehlenswert f√ºr Foodies und Kaffeeliebhaber gleicherma√üen.
Good Mocha, tasty without being overly sweet.  Excellent customer service.  Francesca  is confident and caring at the same time.  Nice job.

We visited this place on the first day of our trip and were so impressed that we came back five times within a week! Even though we had to wait 30 minutes during peak times, it was totally worth it. The food was absolutely delicious, and the staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. It‚Äôs definitely a must-visit! ‚ò∫Ô∏è Try Avo, Bagel and French Toast if you‚Äôll be there!

For lunch today, I felt like some Aussie vibes and decided to swing by Regular NYC. It's a lovely, cute little gem! I had the chicken sandwich, which was light and tasty, and an iced matcha.

Nice vibes. The pastry looked yummy, and the staff was all very smiley and attentive to details. On a side note, nice background music, too!

Will come back 100% and suggest it to friends!

Lovely little hidden gem of a cafe. Extremely friendly and efficient team.
The coffee was one of the best in the city. It was so good, we got an extra one to take away. The breakfast bagel was really delicious.
Small, sleek and cosy vibe.
Cuuute place, great vibes and music. Friendly staff and great food! I had a mocha, bagel sandwich (to die for) and a delish pastry.

Outstanding food! I came for breakfast and ordered the Bircher. My daughter got the Avo with organic egg. Super delicious, beautiful presentation and very friendly customer service. I usually eat low carb but if I‚Äôm going to beer from my diet it‚Äôs only when the food is amazing. Super pleased to break my diet. Great GF and Vegan options for people like me who have  dietary restrictions

Wenn ich in New York bin, esse ich immer hier mein Fr√ºhst√ºck. Die Bedienung ist √§ussert freundlich und auch wenn man alleine ist, f√ºhlt man sich wohl. Das Essen ist ebenfalls sehr gut. Preislich ist es vollkommen in Ordnung, eher teuer, da es in New York ist.

I am so glad to have discovered this gem!!!! Alex and his team are super lovely and the food + coffee were all incredible!

Coffee was AMAZING - dark roast that was full-bodied, incredibly smooth, with pleasant toffee and caramel notes.

I ordered the Ranchero which appears to be on of the more popular items on the menu. The slow cooked brisket was incredibly tender and just a bit spicy from the thinly sliced red chilis. All the elements on the plate worked perfectly together and I left feeling satisfied.

The space is cozy without feeling cramped. It wasn't too busy when I visited but I'll suspect a wait once word gets out about this place.

Enjoyed my experience here and I can't wait to come back to try the other food items!! :)

Regular NYC is a true gem in the FiDi area, offering excellent food and coffee in a cozy, welcoming setting. The staff is exceptionally friendly, making the visit a pleasant experience.

We tried the Benny Ruben and the brisket sandwich, both of which were very flavorful with interesting tastes and quite filling. The hash browns were perfectly made‚Äînot too burnt or oily‚Äîand had great flavor.

I also had an oat latte, which was amazing. It was full-bodied and not sour, unlike what I've experienced at many other cafes.

Overall, Regular NYC stands out as a must-visit spot for anyone in the area, combining great food, excellent coffee, and friendly service in a delightful environment.

Nice little spot to grab some coffee or their well made matcha latte. They had some great options but i picked the beagal, which was hard and not delicious at all, so i just had to get a dessert to polish it off on top. The chocolate cookie was decent and well baked. Kind of pricey, but it could be because im no longer a new yorker.

THE BEST breakfast sandwich in NYC. The bacon, egg and cheese with hash brown on an everything bagel is worth coming down from the Bronx for. And the Ranchero is equally worth the trip. Anything with the brisket is a win to be honest. It‚Äôs slow-cooked and to die for. The coffee is also really good‚Ä¶noticeably different than most coffee spots. It actually tastes like coffee (I drink mine black without sugar) rather than whatever the acidic brown water Starbucks and Dunkin serve is. The staff is also super friendly and accommodating. Extra special shoutout to the owner, Alex. He goes above and beyond to make sure the customer experience is top tier, and in an age of absentee owners he‚Äôs engaged in running the business alongside his employees and it shows.

This is that one local place you cannot go wrong with. 10/10 y‚Äôall, I‚Äôm obsessed with this restaurant. I had the AVO sourdough dish and it was beautiful in every way. I tried my family‚Äôs dishes too and it was all mouthwatering. Everything just tasted fresh and homemade. I officially had the best latte ever, I decided to go with the Waitress‚Äôs go-to which is an almond milk Mocha latte with cinnamon üôåüèΩ so thick and buttery like. Speaking of the waitress we had Gia and I‚Äôm obsessed with her, literally made the experience top tier with her friendliness and knowledge. Her personality is so beautiful and she makes you feel so welcomed. Prices are very reasonable. Love love love this place üòå
